introSubheading: The songs cities are searching for...
introParagraph: Mobile app Shazam helps its users find out about new or forgotten songs. Explore the top ten most-searched-for tracks in 4,900 global cities.
twinTownParagraph: We searched the data for the place in a different continent with the most matches for the songs being looked up in your city.
noTwinTownParagraph1: Not one of the songs being looked up here was also being searched for anywhere else in the world.
noTwinTownParagraph2: There are just 31 cities in the data that have no twin town.
creditsParagraph: Produced by Charlotte Thornton, Punit Shah, Richard Bangay, Ransome Mpini, Ed Lowther and John Walton
shareDescription: Mobile app Shazam helps its users find out about new or forgotten songs. Explore the top ten most-searched-for tracks in 4,900 global cities.
twitterMessage: Musical twin towns - the songs cities are searching for - @BBCNews
